infotexts: Omega Gene Splicing> Once thought impossible to fully integrate with the Europan lifeforms, you've quickly discovered how untrue that is and with your research skills you have invented the worlds highest capacity genetic altering device. Unlocks Omega Gene Splicer recipeWatcher GenesFractal Guardian GenesPsilotoad GenesGolden Hammerhead GenesGenetic Material (Watcher)Subject obtains the ability to produce an perfornance increasing pheromones causing nearby crewmates to become more focused and enraged.Genetic Material (Fractal Guardian)Your brain will fill with information about all things electrical and mechanical, boosting your repairing speeds to unmatchable levels.Genetic Material (Psilotoad)Modified psilotoad genes that produce an antibiotic compound allowing for the reversing of husk infections, you can still be fully infected at high enough infection rate.Genetic Material (Golden Hammerhead)Greatly increases movement speed on land and in water Crawler Broodmother Genes The subject is similar to a crawler broodmother now. Crawlers think you are a broodmother. You spawn a crawler hatchling when taken damage or burn.
